title: Zelek MN - Bronisław Zelek?
content:
I am fairly sure this typeface is called Zelek MN (from Mecanorma I suppose) designed by Bronisław Zelek.  
I am wondering if anyone knows of a digital version?

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322223932im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-2_6289.jpg)
author: zacharyohlman

comments.content:
That isn't Zelek, Zachary. You can see a sampling of Zelek by doing a Search for it at [Paratype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322223932/http:/www.paratype.com/) and viewing their New Zelek. There's also a version called Slant floating around the Web.

I'm afraid that I've no idea what your desired typeface is.

Actually this is zelek MN font, that share its name with new zelek, but is slightly different.

You can see some sample here: [http://www.twardoch.com/download/poltype/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322223932/http:/www.twardoch.com/download/poltype/ "http://www.twardoch.com/download/poltype/")

Unfortunately, i can't find any digital version.
Hi, does someone has printed Mecanorma catalog with this font? I need a scan of it for my student project. Please jelp me!
